page.title: 15 NINE-YEAR OLDS' PLAY
page.content:
When I play out I play football with my friends over in the park. Sometimes we play on roller skates. We play rollerball, it is great fun. We also play cricket, I always lose in cricket. Sometimes I go and play on jymy bike. We used to play a game which is just the same as run-outs, except you draw arrows on the ground with chalk. Nobody likes us playing that now because it makes too much mess, we have to clear it all up.
I like playing war with my friends. I like jumping in puddles and slipping in mud and running through the bushes.
We play French skipping, jumping over a piece of elastic. I like playing tennis and sometimes I practise with my friends.
